title: Lust
description: She was scared, fearing for her life.She needed to get away.She wasn’t expecting to find love. After witnessing a disturbing event, Jasmine Allen escapes to her parents’ house halfway across the country. A chance encounter with an old school friend lands her a job at the notorious gentlemen’s club, LUST. Struggling to deal with her past, her son, and her new job, all she want’s is to feel safe again. However, she doesn’t expect to find security in the arms of a man. He wasn’t looking for love.He wasn’t looking for anything.He certainly didn’t need another woman in his life. Since his mother’s stroke, Max Fox has settled into a daily routine. He doesn’t need or want any other complications in his life. But that all changed the day that she walked into LUST. Fighting to control his feelings for the woman that has hijacked his world, he quarrels with the war of emotions that have interrupted his guarded lifestyle.Will the pair be able to fight their present to become each other’s future?
author: Elle McKenzie
